entry.title: Fortinet IPSEC VPN on Linux
entry.summary: /etc/ipsec.secrets 'vpn username' = XAUTH 0s..... 'vpn machine' = PSK 0s..... /etc/ipsec.conf conn fortinet left= leftauth=psk leftid="" leftauth2=xauth xauth_identity="vpn username" leftsourceip=%config right='VPN IP' rightsubnet='Internal IP subnet'/24 rightauth=psk keyexchange=ikev1 aggressive=yes ike=aes128-sha1-modp1536! esp=aes128-sha1-modp1536! auto=add More about IPSec secrets here: https://wiki.strongswan.org/projects/strongswan/wiki/IpsecSecrets
entry.content:
/etc/ipsec.secrets

'vpn username' = XAUTH 0s.....

'vpn machine' = PSK 0s.....

/etc/ipsec.conf

conn fortinet
    left=
    leftauth=psk
    leftid=""
    leftauth2=xauth
    xauth_identity="vpn username"
    leftsourceip=%config
    right='VPN IP'
    rightsubnet='Internal IP subnet'/24
    rightauth=psk
    keyexchange=ikev1
    aggressive=yes
    ike=aes128-sha1-modp1536!
    esp=aes128-sha1-modp1536!
    auto=add

More about IPSec secrets here: https://wiki.strongswan.org/projects/strongswan/wiki/IpsecSecrets
